Posts.EditableText: 007Bond pontificated [quote:1cb0vx6x]i'll say your english is bad.[/quote:1cb0vx6x] Then later he added [quote:1cb0vx6x]even if it might of been spam[/quote:1cb0vx6x] I don't normally comment on picky things like grammar and spelling but really, 007Bond, you should not complain of another person's English while not using capital letters and dropping the mammoth gaff of saying "it might OF been" instead of "it might HAVE been." Sorry folks, that was boring but it hacks me off to see someone complaining of someone else doing what he, himself does. (Hastily checking my own spelling and grammar). Frank
